response.message: Thanks for taking the time to do these podcasts. Very enjoyable.
I'd pay at least a grand for an original SO server with the "autograph" on it.
When will episodes be on iTunes? It would be awesome if you could get them up sooner, I much prefer listening on my phone.

Your discussion of trying to move the servers down the street using battery backups and carts reminded me of the Seinfeld episode (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Frogger) where George tried to move the Frogger machine without losing his high score. Too funny!

This was a great episode, thank you for doing it.  We are dealing with providing instant fail-over for our hosted app as well and it was good to hear what other people are thinking.
waiting for these episodes to be on iTunes to listen with my new IPhone 5.
Is this postcast available in Windows Phone Marketplace(Zune)?
Surreal listening to this podcast after Sandy
